verbs.description: [V: hate] [ARG1: speech] is infecting america but trying to ban it is not the answer history shows that punishing hate speech risks creating martyrs and rallying support there is no evidence that banning hate speech does anything to lessen the presence in society of racist ideas or even racist crimes hate speech pittsburgh america kentucky
